name: Word Connect (Amexstudio)
description:
Word Connect is a brain-training game that tests your vocabulary, pattern recognition, and quick thinking. You will have to connect words in each level in order to complete a level in this tricky word puzzle game. Enjoy more than 300 levels. Use hints to get clue to your movements. Get hints by sharing the game. 

-Fun and enjoying 

-Good Graphics

 -Easy interface

 -Good game sound 

Are you up for the challenge?
